member.name: RM_UNIQUE_PROCESS
member.summary: Uniquely identifies a process by its PID and the time the process began. An array of RM_UNIQUE_PROCESS structures can be passed to the function.

member.name: RM_UNIQUE_PROCESS.ProcessStartTime
member.summary: The creation time of the process. The time is provided as a FILETIME structure that is returned by the lpCreationTime parameter of the function.
